subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Slick-fielding rockies shortstop Troy Tulowitzki started the season mired in a slump and then suffered an injury Tuesday that could sideline him until the All-Star break.
snippet: Slick-fielding rockies shortstop Troy Tulowitzki started the season mired in a slump and then suffered an injury Tuesday that could sideline him until the All-Star break.
